title: I Was in Another World Before I Knew It, but I Think I Can Handle It Because I Have Item Box With Transcendent Feature - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Clever Protagonist   Cooking   Dragons   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Guilds   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Lack of Common Sense   Male Protagonist   Merchants   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Sudden Wealth   Transported to Another World   Unique Weapons
author: Asakura Bokushi   朝倉牧師
description:
On my way home from work, I stopped by a convenience store, bought some bento, and thought I'd finally arrived home.

The standard explanatory character didn't appear. Thanks to that, I don't even know why I'm in this situation. It's so unreasonable.

That's right, the liquor and toys I ordered online were supposed to arrive today!　They should have been in the delivery box I was reaching for! I yelled, then a strange board appeared in front of me.
Item box? Delivery box? An online store? What the hell is this?

Anyway, can I do something with this?
That's what I thought, but then I was confronted with a shocking fact.

[Resale prohibited!]

Well, it looks like there are still some ways to do it. I'll just have to use this item box to live in this world.>
